title: Vacation rental agreements (Airbnb, VRBO)
dataVerified: Guest/host names, property address, dates, nightly rate, cleaning fee, total
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Booking status (confirmed/completed/disputed). Link to platform system (guest and host, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents altered rental agreements (changing terms post-booking). Domain binding verifies platform (Airbnb, VRBO). Security deposit documentation. Damage claim evidence. Tax reporting (rental income/expense). Multi-page: Rental agreements multi-page.
